ol.li: Verify the Rescuer(s) have received theoretical and practical instruction of the rescuing procedure.
Designated Rescuers must be adequately trained and have easy access to all the equipment they need to effectively rescue others safely and as quickly as possible.

Employees shallÂ work in teams: if they work alone, it will not be possible for a rescue procedure to be carried out on time. Make sure that someone is always in the condition to call the emergency contact during the entire duration of the work.
